getPSDEFormItemUpdates.name: 从发货到开单
getPSDEFormItemUpdates.scriptCode:
data.billing_street = data.shipping_street
data.billing_city = data.shipping_city
data.billing_state = data.shipping_state
data.billing_code = data.shipping_code
data.billing_country = data.shipping_country

getPSDEFormItemUpdates.name: 从开单到发货

data.shipping_code = data.billing_code
